Associate####azurerm_virtual_hub_connect: If azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.remote_virtual_network_id depends on azurerm_virtual_network.b.id, Then azurerm_virtual_network.b and azurerm_virtual_hub.c connected or associated with each other via azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a
ConflictChild####azurerm_virtual_hub_con: If azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a.remote_virtual_network_id depends on azurerm_virtual_network.b.id, Then azurerm_virtual_network.b could only have a single azurerm_virtual_hub_connection that is azurerm_virtual_hub_connection.a
